thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - SCORPION
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Scorpion難易度・★★★★★☆☆☆ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost==="Like Sub-Zero, Scorpion's true name and origin are not known. He has shown from time to time distrust and hatred towards Sub-Zero. Between Ninjas, this is usually a sign of opposing clans." 「サブゼロ同様、スコーピオンの本当の名前と出自は不明です。彼は時折、サブゼロに対して不信感と憎しみを示してきました。忍者の間では、これは通常、対立する一族の兆候です。」「同零下一樣，蠍子嘅真名同出身都係未知嘅。佢有時會對零下表現出唔信任同仇恨。喺忍者當中，呢個通常係對手族嘅象徵。」===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Scorpion)00:17 Sub-Zero (Bi Han)00:53 Liu Kang01:38 Sonya Blade02:23 Test Your Might - Wood02:32 Johnny Cage03:12 Kano03:59 Raiden04:41 Test Your Might - Stone04:50 Scorpion (Mirror Match)05:36 Endurance I (Sub-Zero, Sonya)06:40 Endurance II (Kano, Cage)07:44 Test Your Might - Steel07:54 Endurance III (Kano, Raiden)09:00 Goro09:45 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)10:35 Ending & Credits12:54 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
